content: so first of all to be able to make this doll you ll need to know the basics of how to crochet even though this pattern is very easy to follow you can find the terminology of amigurumi in it which will help you understand the pattern i ve included some pictures in it as well and the stuff that you re going to need are light pink lemon green yellow and white light weight yarn materials scissor hook size 3 5 plastic eyes needle and some fiberfill for stuffing if you have more questions don t hesitate to contact me d
